content.p: A project , especially a free software project , is all about the community. DotGNU , following the tradition of all the GNU projects ,aims at creating a community where the freedom is provided,enjoyed and utilized. The DotGNU community effort moves up to build a strong foundation for the pillars of a new free internet.

Listed below is a brief and alphabetical list of the DotGNU people who are involved with the project . The list includes people working on the various projects as well as people who are using DotGNU for their work. If you belong to either category and want your name listed here , please contact the dotgnu WEBSITE mailing list at (website@dotgnu.org).

Hi, My name is Brandon Bremen. You can contact me via email with brandon@luniac.com Or you could visit my website at [http://raboof.net]. I've been dotgnu'ing since March 2002. So far I've been helping dotgnu with these.
MacOS compatibility
Writing a forever delayed PR article
I'm a student. And "California" is where I am most likely found. I usually visit IRC under the nick <absurd>.

Hi, My name is Ch Gowri Kumar. You can contact me via email with gkumar@csa.iisc.ernet.in . I've been dotgnu'ing since Oct. 2002. So far I've been helping dotgnu with these.

I'm a student, Indian Institute Of Science. And "Bangalore, India, IST" is where I am most likely found. I usually visit IRC under the nick <Gowri>.
